articles.title: New Report Says Cancer Survivor Numbers Are Increasing - Technology Networks
articles.description: In a report, researchers have shown that most Americans with a history of cancer were 65 years or older and there are racial disparities in cancer treatment and survival.

articles.title: US Senate passes gun safety bill as Supreme Court loosens handgun limits - ABC News
articles.description: The US Senate passes the first significant gun control legislation in three decades as the Supreme Court rules Americans have a constitutional right to carry handguns in public for self-defence.

articles.title: Scientists observe longitudinal plasmonic field in nanocavity at subnano-scale - Phys.org
articles.description: A group of scientists working on surface-enhanced Raman spectroscopy (SERS) has made a nanoruler to provide insight into the longitudinal plasmonic fields in nanocavities, according to research published in the Journal of the American Chemical Society.
